title: Growth Marketing Manager -  Digital
content:
About Orchard
Orchard is radically simplifying the way people buy and sell their homes. For the average American, the home purchase and sale process takes months, creates anxiety, and is filled with uncertainty and hassle. Orchard has reimagined the end-to-end experience of buying and selling, from innovative home search tools to find the perfect home to the ability to buy a new home before selling your current one. Orchard customers manage the entire experience through a personalized online dashboard, while also getting the support of best-in-class Orchard real estate agents. 
Headquartered in New York City with an office in Austin and teammates across the US, Orchard boasts over 300 employees. We have financing from top-tier investors including Revolution, Firstmark, Accomplice, Navitas and Juxtapose, who have also backed the likes of Pinterest, Airbnb, Shopify and Sweetgreen. We're proud to be recognized by Crain's, Inc. 5000, Glassdoor, Parity.org and Built In on their lists of best places to work.About the Role
Orchard is looking for a Marketing Manager to lead the scaling and optimization of our paid digital marketing efforts. This role will analyze and manage campaigns across Google Ads, Microsoft Ads, Facebook, Instagram, and test new digital channels, leveraging data-driven insights to drive new leads for the business.
The right candidate is highly analytical with a bias for action. You will work day to day running campaigns in Google Ads and Facebook Ads Manager, digging into the data to understand the “why” behind performance, and launching tests to improve upon it. You’ll also get to flex your creative muscles by owning landing page testing and working closely with our internal creative team to design and test new ad formats. This role is a unique opportunity for a digital marketer to scale their impact or for an agency media manager to gain experience on the client side.
This is a full-time role that will report into the Senior Manager of Growth Marketing. Option to be remote in the following locations: AZ, CA, CO, CT, DC, FL, GA, MA, MD, NC, NJ, NY, OR, SC, TN, TX, VA, WA, WI or based out of our NYC or Austin office.
What You’ll Do Here:

Oversee day to day management of all Orchard paid digital campaigns to hit our growth KPI targets
Deliver reporting, insights, and forecasts that accurately and appropriately measure channel performance
Work with our no-code web development tooling and product teams to test new landing page experiences, segmentation, and targeting tactics
Collaborate with internal creative team to launch customer-centric creative tests across a variety of formats (ex: static, video, testimonials)
Build a deep understanding of our customer funnel, ensuring your channels are driving high-quality leads

We’d Love to Hear From You if You Have:

3+ years of experience managing paid search campaigns to specific KPI goals
2+ years of experience managing paid social campaigns to specific KPI goals
Experience with data analytics and visualization platforms such as Tableau, Google Analytics, or Looker
Experience with high consideration/LTV products
Strong written and verbal communication skills and can synthesize learnings to share with stakeholders and executive leadership
Amazing attention to detail
Team player attitude and comfort working in a fast-paced environment

#LI_SD1Orchard is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We provide employment opportunities without regard to age, race, color, ancestry, national origin, religion, disability, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, veteran status, or any other protected status in accordance with applicable law.

demographic_questions.description:
We are committed to cultivating and retaining a diverse team. Any demographic data you provide will help us continue to hold ourselves accountable to our goals and identify new areas of improvement in our interviewing and hiring process. 

While we know that checking boxes can never fully capture the complexity of your identity, we’ve tried to make the options in this survey inclusive. Your responses will be anonymous and used in aggregate only. They will not be associated with your specific application or used in any way in the hiring decision.

answer_options.label: South Asian (including Bangladeshi, Bhutanese, Indian, Nepali, Pakistani, and Sri Lankan)
